headline.main: Obama hosts Gulf leaders at Camp David for "candid" talks
headline.sub: Obama hosts Gulf leaders at Camp David for "candid" talks

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama on Thursday said he had "candid" talks with leaders from Gulf states on topics ranging from Iran to Syria at a Camp David summit. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama on Thursday said he had "candid" talks with leaders from Gulf states on topics ranging from Iran to Syria at a Camp David summit. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Two Students Shot Dead After March in Chile
headline.print_headline: Two Students Shot Dead After March in Chile

docs.snippet: Two students were shot dead in the port town of Valparaiso in Chile on Thursday afternoon following a protest march earlier in the day....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two students were shot dead in the port town of Valparaiso in Chile on Thursday afternoon following a protest march earlier in the day.

headline.main: North Carolina City Settles Police Shooting Lawsuit for $2.25 Million
headline.print_headline: North Carolina City Settles Police Shooting Lawsuit for $2.25 Million

docs.snippet: The city of Charlotte has agreed to pay $2.25 million to the family of Jonathan Ferrell, an unarmed black man shot and killed by a white police officer two years ago, in a civil settlement announced Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The city of Charlotte has agreed to pay $2.25 million to the family of Jonathan Ferrell, an unarmed black man shot and killed by a white police officer two years ago, in a civil settlement announced Thursday.

headline.main: Rick Santorum Says He’s Baffled by Jeb Bush on Iraq

docs.snippet: Rick Santorum, who delivered a surprisingly strong performance in the 2012 presidential campaign and may run again in 2016, said he was baffled by Jeb Bush’s handling this week of a question about the 2003 war in Iraq....
docs.abstract: Rick Santorum, who delivered a surprisingly strong performance in the 2012 presidential campaign and may run again in 2016, said he was baffled by Jeb Bush’s handling this week of a question about the 2003 war in Iraq.

headline.main: Iranian Shooting at Clear Violation of International Law - Saudi Minister
headline.print_headline: Iranian Shooting at Clear Violation of International Law - Saudi Minister

docs.snippet: The Iranian navy's shooting at a Singapore-flagged tanker in the Gulf on Thursday is a clear violation of international law, Saudi Arabia's foreign minister said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Iranian navy's shooting at a Singapore-flagged tanker in the Gulf on Thursday is a clear violation of international law, Saudi Arabia's foreign minister said.

headline.main: U.S., Gulf Nations Agree Iran Nuclear Deal Is in Their Security Interests
headline.print_headline: U.S., Gulf Nations Agree Iran Nuclear Deal Is in Their Security Interests

docs.snippet: The United States and its Gulf nation allies agree that a nuclear deal with Iran is in their security interests, U.S. President Barack Obama and officials from the Gulf Cooperation Council member states said in a joint statement on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States and its Gulf nation allies agree that a nuclear deal with Iran is in their security interests, U.S. President Barack Obama and officials from the Gulf Cooperation Council member states said in a joint statement on Thursday.

headline.main: Review: In ‘The Film Critic,’ a Snob Is Tripped Up by His Heartstrings
headline.print_headline: The World-Weary Snob Trips on His Heartstrings

docs.snippet: The Argentine director Hernán Guerschuny skewers the pretensions of movie criticism in this film, starring Rafael Spregelburd....
docs.abstract: A O Scott reviews movie The Film Critic (El Critico), written and directed by Hernan Guerschuny and starring Dolores Fonzi and Rafael Spregelburd.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Argentine director Hernán Guerschuny skewers the pretensions of movie criticism in this film, starring Rafael Spregelburd.

headline.main: Connecticut Police Say Prisoner Linked to Bodies Found Behind Mall
headline.print_headline: Connecticut Police Say Prisoner Linked to Bodies Found Behind Mall

docs.snippet: A Connecticut prisoner who pleaded guilty to manslaughter a decade ago is now a suspect in the deaths of seven other people, including four whose bodies were found behind a shopping mall this week, police said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Connecticut prisoner who pleaded guilty to manslaughter a decade ago is now a suspect in the deaths of seven other people, including four whose bodies were found behind a shopping mall this week, police said on Thursday.
